```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(readxl)
library(DT)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)


data<-read_excel("C:/Work/NEOMA_group 1/Chicago_small.xlsx") %>% clean_names()
```


## Initial data presentation

```{r}
datatable(data)
```

## Arrests by primary type of a crime

```{r}
data %>% 
  select(primary_type, arrest) %>% 
  group_by(primary_type) %>% 
  summarise(Number_of_arrests=sum(arrest)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Number_of_arrests)) %>% 
  datatable()
```
